languages.text: "Она послужила наглядным примером, что великие права, даруемые Патентом, надо и использовать с великой осторожностью. На этом ее полезность исчерпана".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Эту мразь надо было приговорить еще там, в рассаднике нелюдей, куда она нас затащила. Одного я не понимаю — чего ради вы медлите?"
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.text: "She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."
languages.original_text: "Она послужила наглядным примером, что великие права, даруемые Патентом, надо и использовать с великой осторожностью. На этом ее полезность исчерпана".

traits.locale_text: "She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."
"She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."
"She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."
"She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."
"She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."

languages.text: "Sie ist ein gutes Beispiel dafür, dass die große Macht, die der Handelsbrief gewährt, auch mit großer Vorsicht eingesetzt werden muss. Das ist das Ende ihrer Nützlichkeit."
languages.original_text: "She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."

traits.locale_text: "Sie ist ein gutes Beispiel dafür, dass die große Macht, die der Handelsbrief gewährt, auch mit großer Vorsicht eingesetzt werden muss. Das ist das Ende ihrer Nützlichkeit."

languages.text: « Elle est la preuve vivante que les grands pouvoirs conférés par la lettre de marque doivent être employés avec une prudence tout aussi grande. Son utilité s'arrête là. »
languages.original_text: "She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."

traits.locale_text: « Elle est la preuve vivante que les grands pouvoirs conférés par la lettre de marque doivent être employés avec une prudence tout aussi grande. Son utilité s'arrête là. »

languages.text: “她是个很明显的例子，即便是神圣授状赋予的至高权力，也必须谨慎使用。她的用处已经到此为止了。”
languages.original_text: "She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."

traits.locale_text: “她是个很明显的例子，即便是神圣授状赋予的至高权力，也必须谨慎使用。她的用处已经到此为止了。”

languages.text: «Es un claro ejemplo de que los amplios poderes que otorga la Patente también deben usarse con gran cautela. Esa es toda su utilidad».
languages.original_text: "She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."

traits.locale_text: «Es un claro ejemplo de que los amplios poderes que otorga la Patente también deben usarse con gran cautela. Esa es toda su utilidad».

languages.text: 「彼女は、令状によって与えられた大きな力は同時に慎重に使わなければならないという明確な例として役立っています。彼女の役目はそれで終わりです」
languages.original_text: "She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女は、令状によって与えられた大きな力は同時に慎重に使わなければならないという明確な例として役立っています。彼女の役目はそれで終わりです」

languages.text: "Ruhsatname'nin bahşettiği büyük güçlerin aynı zamanda büyük bir dikkatle kullanılması gerektiğinin en açık örneği o. Faydası sona erdi işte."
languages.original_text: "She serves as a clear example that the great powers bestowed by the Warrant must also be used with great caution. That is the end of her usefulness."

traits.locale_text: "Ruhsatname'nin bahşettiği büyük güçlerin aynı zamanda büyük bir dikkatle kullanılması gerektiğinin en açık örneği o. Faydası sona erdi işte."
